name: USX CORPORATION, Appellant v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (MILTON), Appellee
name_abbreviation: USX Corp. v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
parties: USX CORPORATION, Appellant v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (MILTON), Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marie Jurbala Shiring, Pittsburgh, for Appellant USX Corp.

Daniel King Bricmont, Pittsburgh, for Appellee, Henry Milton.
